descript.abstract:
The Park-and-Ride layer contains the 196 existing and future park-and-ride lots in the Twin Cities Metropolitan area.
The dataset was geocoded using TLG centerline streets. When specific site details were available, the geography was moved off the street lines to the actual lot locations using 2005 Markhurd orthophotography as a base layer. All attempts were made to correctly reflect the real lot locations; however, the positional accuracy of this data cannot be guaranteed.
Attribute information is considered current to the metadata date and will be updated as needed.
descript.purpose: To identify all park-and-ride locations in the Twin Cities metropolitan area.
descript.supplinf: Twin Cities Metropolitan Area - including Minnesota Counties: Anoka, Carver, Chisago, Dakota, Goodhue, Hennepin, Isanti, Le Sueur, Mille Lacs, Ramsey, Rice, Scott, Sherburne, Stearns, Washington, Wright; Wisconsin Counties: Dunn, St. Croix

timeperd.current: Park-and-ride locations are accurate as of the Time Period of Content date for the Twin Cities Metropolitan Area.

place.placekey: Twin Cities, Minnesota, Anoka County, Carver County, Chisago County, Dakota County, Goodhue County, Hennepin County, Isanti County, Le Sueur County, Mille Lacs County, Ramsey County, Rice County, Scott County, Sherburne County, Stearns County, Washington County, Wright County, Dunn County, St. Croix County

theme.themekey: Transit Centers, Transit Stops, Transit Routes, Transit Patterns by Node Segments, transit, buses, nodes, stops, transportation

browse.browsed: Sample map showing the Park and Ride Lots layer.

citeinfo.title: Transit Centers, Transit Stops, Transit Routes

attracc.attraccr: Attributes are considered accurate. See the Entity and Attribute Overview for more details.

dataqual.complete: All active park-and-rides in the metropolitan area are covered.

horizpa.horizpar: Orthophotos were used in referencing the park-and-ride lot locations. Positional accuracy varies throughout the dataset. In some cases, locations outside the seven county metro area were located using NCompass Technologies Street Centerline and Address Ranges dataset where available and not have been referenced to aerial photos.

spdoinfo.mgmg3til: One file for entire metro area.

overview.eaover:
PnRNum: P&R ID #. Same as "T Code" without the "T"
Old_PnRNum: Former P&R ID #, if applicable
TCode: T Code (P&R ID # with a "T" as the first character)
NAME: Park-and-ride name
LocDetails: Park-and-Ride location details (e.g., intersection, quadrant, portion of parking lot)
Address: Park-and-Ride Address, if available (Some park-and-rides are located within road right-of-way and do not have an address)
City: City in which facility is located
Provider: Transit service provider at facility
Type: PR = Park-and-Ride PP = Park-and-Pool
ACTIVE: 1 = Active; 0 = Inactive
Status: Current Facility Status Open = Facility is open for use Closed = Facility is closed Occasional = Facility is used seasonally or for special events only Future = Possible future facility
OccasUse: Description of occasional facility use
OverflwLot: Facility is an overflow lot for another park-and-ride N = Not an overflow lot Y, <Facility Name> = Yes, an overflow lot for <specified> facility
CurrntTway: Name of existing transitway serving facility
FutureTway: Name of future transitway serving facility
Year_Est: Year facility was established. May not be available for "historic" facilities
Year_Close: Year facility was closed
CurrntCpct: Current Capacity (field is updated as facility capacity increases or decreases)
PrkngType: Parking Lot Type Surface = Surface parking lot Structured = Structured parking ramp Surface & Structured = Combination of parking in a structured ramp and surface lot
SharedUse: Y = Parking is shared use with another use; N = Parking is not shared with another use
ShrUseDesc: Description of shared or complementary use
BikePrkng: Bike Parking Present Y = Yes N = No Blank = Future Facility, Historic Facility, or Unknown
EVChrgeStn: Electric Vehicle Charging Station(s) Present Y = Yes N = No Blank = Future Facility, Historic Facility, or Unknown
ShelterSA: Standalone Transit Shelter Present Y = Yes N = No Blank = Future Facility, Historic Facility, or Unknown
IndoorWt: Indoor Waiting Area Present Y = Yes N = No Blank = Future Facility, Historic Facility, or Unknown
LghtPrkng: Lights in the Parking Area Present Y = Yes N = No Blank = Future Facility, Historic Facility, or Unknown
DropOff: Designated Drop-Off Area ("Kiss & Ride") Present Y = Yes N = No Blank = Future Facility, Historic Facility, or Unknown
Bench_SA: Stand Alone Bench Present Y = Yes N = No Blank = Future Facility, Historic Facility, or Unknown
TrashRec: Trash Receptacle Bench Present Y = Yes N = No Blank = Future Facility, Historic Facility, or Unknown
PblicRest: Public Restroom Present Y = Yes N = No Blank = Future Facility, Historic Facility, or Unknown
OpRestrm: Operator Restroom Present Y = Yes N = No Blank = Future Facility, Historic Facility, or Unknown
Elevator: Elevator Present Y = Yes N = No Blank = Future Facility, Historic Facility, or Unknown
Escalator: Escalator Present Y = Yes N = No Blank = Future Facility, Historic Facility, or Unknown
Mpls_Corr: Downtown Minneapolis express bus corridor served by park-and-ride
Stp_Corr: Downtown St. Paul express bus corridor served by park-and-ride
LandOwn: Owner of land on which facility is located (facility owner may be different)
FcltyOwn: Owner of transit facility (may be different from land owner)
Leased: Y = Facility is leased from another owner; N = facility is not leased
PrPlCapc08: 2030 Park-and-Ride Plan - park-and-ride 2008 "base year" capacity
PrPlCapc30: 2030 Park-and-Ride Plan - park-and-ride 2030 planned capacity
PrPlRec: 2030 Park-and-Ride Plan Facility Status in Chapter 3 : Existing Facility - Park-and-Ride = Existing park-and-rides at the time the Plan was developed Existing Facility - Park-and-POOL = Existing park-and-pools at the time the Plan was developed Park-and-Ride - Expand = Existing facilities planned for expansion with no funding identified Park-and-Ride - Funded Expn = Existing facilities planned for expansion with funding identified Park-and-Ride - Future = Planned future facility with no funding identified Park-and-Ride - New Funded = Planned future facility with funding identified Park-and-Ride - To Close = Facility will close upon construction or expansion of a different facility Park-and-Ride - Tway = Park-and-Ride = Planned future facility to be constructed as part of a transitway project Park-and-Ride - Tway Exp = Existing facilities planned for expansion as part of a transitway project
Notes: Facility notes about capacity corrections, expansion, closure notes and other miscellaneous information
overview.eadetcit: PR_PP: Park-and-pool or Park-and-Ride type (based on 2030 P&R Plan): -Park-and-POOL = park-and-pool lot (no transit service at facility) -Park-and-Ride = Existing P&R facility with no planned capacity expansion or closure. -Park-and-Ride- Expand = Existing P&R facility with planned capacity expansion (and no identified funding source) -Park-and-Ride Funded Expn = Existing P&R facility with planned capacity expansion and an identified funding source (e.g., CMAQ or other grant) -Park-and-Ride- Future = New P&R facility with no identified funding source -Park-and-Ride New Funded = New P&R facility with an identified funding source (e.g., CMAQ or other grant) -Park-and-Ride- To Close = Existing P&R facility planned for closure pending construction of new facility -Park-and-Ride- Tway = New P&R facility along a Transitway corridor identified in 2030 TPP - Park-and-Ride- Tway Exp = Existing P&R facility with planned capacity expansion along a Transitway corridor identified in the 2030 TPP

distinfo.distliab: NOTICE: The Geographic Information System (GIS) Data to which this notice is attached are made available pursuant to the Minnesota Government Data Practices Act (Minnesota Statutes Chapter 13). THE GIS DATA ARE PROVIDED TO YOU AS IS AND WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY AS TO THEIR PERFORMANCE, MERCHANTABILITY, OR FITNESS FOR ANY PARTICULAR PURPOSE. The GIS Data were developed by the Metropolitan Council for its own internal business purposes. The Metropolitan Council does not represent or warrant that the GIS Data or the data documentation are error-free, complete, current, or accurate. You are responsible for any consequences resulting from your use of the GIS Data or your reliance on the GIS Data. You should consult the data documentation for this particular GIS Data to determine the limitations of the GIS Data and the precision with which the GIS Data may depict distance, direction, location, or other geographic features. If you transmit or provide the GIS Data (or any portion of it) to another user, it is recommended that the GIS Data include a copy of this disclaimer and this metadata.
